mapper.select: select postNo, c.cateNo, postTitle, to_char(p.regDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate from category c, post p where c.cateNo = p.cateNo and p.cateNo = #{cateNo} and c.id = #{id} order by postNo desc

select rt.postNo, rt.cateNo, rt.postTitle, rt.regDate from( select rownum rn, ot.postNo, ot.cateNo, ot.postTitle, ot.regDate from( select postNo, c.cateNo, postTitle, to_char(p.regDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate from category c, post p where c.cateNo = p.cateNo and p.cateNo = #{cateNo} and c.id = #{id} order by postNo desc ) ot )rt where rn >= #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}
select postNo, postTitle, postContent, to_char(p.regDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate from post p where postNo = #{postNo}
mapper.insert: insert into post values( seq_post_no.nextval, #{cateNo}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select count(postNo) from post p, category c where p.cateNo = c.cateNo and p.cateNo = #{cateNo}
